title: Borders, 1795–1804
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
dimensions:
a. Warp: 101.5cm (40in.). Weft: 26cm (10 1/2in)(Right selvedge present)
b. Warp: 24.5cm (9 3/4in.). Weft: 25.5cm (10in.)(Left selvedge present).
description:
The left and right borders of a 'Pompeian Style' fabric. The border design on each is identical but the motifs on what would have been the field are different. Another border fragment in the same color scheme has been sewn to the bottom of 'a'. 
The colors are 2 reds, orange and black on a strong yellow ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Borders, 1795–1804.
1795–1804. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-251-a,b.
